data.title: West Wing star Ron Silver dies aged 62
data.meta_description: A tribute to my friend, Ron Ron Silver, a political activist and star of The West Wing television series, died at home yesterday aged 62. The award-winning actor was diagnosed with cancer of the
data.text:
A tribute to my friend, Ron

Ron Silver, a political activist and star of The West Wing television series, died at home yesterday aged 62.

The award-winning actor was diagnosed with cancer of the oesophagus two years ago. He passed away in his sleep early yesterday morning surrounded by his family in New York City.

Silver was an established stage actor but he was best known for his role as Bruno Gianelli, a political strategist who helped President Bartlett win re-election in the third series of The West Wing. He returned to the show in later series after his Emmy-nominated portrayal of the confrontational advisor.
